BasicDescription.Title: Talking Movies
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest US movie news, including a look at the sequel to Analyze That, the 10th Star Trek offering, Star Trek: Nemesis, plus Jennifer Lopez in the romantic comedy, Maid In Manhattan.

and sports scores live on your computer desktop, visit the BBCi
